name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Python Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **Python**, **Django**, and **AWS** to develop high-performance backend solutions. My extensive knowledge of cloud services is complemented by hands-on experience with **Azure** and **GCP**, along with infrastructure management using **Terraform**, **CDK**, and **CloudFormation**. I am proficient in **CI/CD** automation, leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to streamline deployment processes. 
In addition to my backend expertise, I possess solid skills in **relational databases** and **schema-less databases**, which allow me to design efficient data storage solutions. I have a deep understanding of microservices architecture and am experienced with **GraphQL** and **gRPC** for building scalable APIs. 
Alongside my technical skills, I have successfully led the development of enterprise applications while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I bring a collaborative approach, working effectively within teams to create robust, secure, and innovative software solutions.
